Posts.Content: Hi MomG, Nice to hear from you. In case you are concerned about the scar and want it to be removed, consult a dermatologist and discuss about Scar removal creams. Newer patented{ Elicina } ones are very useful and produce good results.Read more here http://www.bioskincare.com/scars/scargel/ Take care.
